perturbation.original_text: TL may purchase from Integrity limited quantities of the Product for its promotional use, at the Manufacturing cost set forth in paragraph 3(a) above, provided the quantity of such purchases does not exceed seven percent (7%) of the total royalty bearing units of such Product title purchased by TL, TL warrants that any units so purchased, whether or not labeled "promotional only" or cut-out, will be given away for purposes of promotion of the Products, and will not be sold. If for any reason, Integrity and TL are subject to lower "free goods" limits by any third party license, the foregoing shall be adjusted to comply with any such license(s).
perturbation.changed_text: TL may purchase from Integrity unlimited quantities of the Product for any use, at a negotiable cost. TL warrants that any units so purchased may be sold at TL's discretion. If for any reason, Integrity and TL are subject to lower "free goods" limits by any third party license, the foregoing shall be adjusted to comply with any such license(s).
perturbation.explanation: The original text restricts TL's promotional purchases to 7% and prohibits sales. The modified version removes the quantity limit and allows TL to sell the purchased products, contradicting the initial restrictions and creating uncertainty around the terms of product usage and sale.

perturbation.original_text: The parties agree that the initial suggested retail selling price for the products will be $19.95 for CD's, $17.95 for Cassettes, and $19.95 for song books. Any change in the suggested retail selling price will be mutually agreed by the parties. The parties acknowledge that they cannot control the prices set by independent retailers and resellers, but agree that sales by the parties hereto via e-commerce will be the same, and such will be mutually agreed.
perturbation.changed_text: The parties agree that the initial suggested retail selling price for the products are suggestions only, with TL having final say. Any change in the suggested retail selling price can be unilaterally decided by TL. The parties acknowledge that they cannot control the prices set by independent retailers and resellers, but agree that sales by the parties hereto via e-commerce will follow the pricing that TL sets, but Integrity maintains the right to charge what it likes.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires mutual agreement for price changes. The modified version gives TL unilateral control over price changes and allows Integrity to set its own e-commerce prices, contradicting the initial agreement for mutual pricing and consistent e-commerce sales and creating uncertainty about who has control over the pricing.

perturbation.original_text: Integrity will hold exclusive worldwide rights to promote and sell the product to/through the following distribution channels: Christian retail (CBA or Christian Booksellers Association markets), direct mail (including continuity sales, church sales, digital and e-commerce sales.) Integrity will have Internet and e-commerce rights with respect to its own web site and other Christian e-commerce. Integrity shall have the right to license distribution of the Product through all channels of distribution throughout the remainder of the world.
perturbation.changed_text: Integrity will hold exclusive worldwide rights to promote and sell the product to/through the following distribution channels: Christian retail (CBA or Christian Booksellers Association markets), direct mail (including continuity sales, church sales, digital and e-commerce sales.) Integrity will have Internet and e-commerce rights with respect to its own web site and other Christian e-commerce. Integrity shall not have the right to license distribution of the Product through any channels of distribution throughout the remainder of the world.
perturbation.explanation: The original text gives Integrity the right to license distribution of the product. The modified version removes this right, contradicting the initial agreement and creating uncertainty about Integrity's distribution rights.
